meanings.definition: Constructed or made in advance, especially in standardized sections for quick assembly.
meanings.sent1: The prefabbed house was built in record time.
meanings.sent2: The prefabbed furniture was easy to put together.
meanings.sent3: The prefabbed picnic table brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: Her prefabbed speech was a hit at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The prefabbed carport stood out in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To construct or make something in advance, especially in standardized sections for quick assembly.
meanings.sent1: They prefabbed the shed before transporting it to the site.
meanings.sent2: The company prefabbed the walls off-site to save time.
meanings.sent3: He prefabbed the treehouse as a surprise for his kids.
meanings.sent4: She prefabbed the cake layers for easy assembly later.
meanings.sent5: The team prefabbed the stage for the concert.
